results.name: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord - Digital Deluxe

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 9
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (or equivalent) 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: with 1 GB VRAM compatible with DirectX
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

results.name: Syren and Friends Roast the Dev

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 Ghz circa 2013
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Videos and some Gameplay sections may not be smooth when using minimum requirements.

Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 64-bit 16.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 3GHz Duo Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
